Package be.projet3.toutouapp.services

Interface IRequestService

All Known Implementing Classes:
RequestService
public interface IRequestService
Interface for managing Request entities. Defines the contract for business logic operations related to Requests.
Author:
Amico Matteo
See Also:
  • be.projet3.toutouapp.services

    Method

  • Method Details

    • getRequests

      List<Request> getRequests()
      Retrieves all Request entities from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Request entities

    • addRequest

      Request addRequest(Request request)
      Adds a new Request entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      request - the Request entity to be added
      Returns:
      the saved Request entity

    • updateRequest

      Request updateRequest(Request request)
      Updates an existing Request entity in the database.
      Parameters:
      request - the Request entity to be updated
      Returns:
      the updated Request entity

    • deleteRequest

      void deleteRequest(int id)
      Deletes a Request entity with the specified ID from the database. If no entity with the given ID exists, the method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Request entity to be deleted

    • getRequestsByUserId

      List<Request> getRequestsByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves all Request entities associated with a specific user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose requests are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of Request entities belonging to the specified user

    • getRequestById

      Request getRequestById(int id)
      Retrieves a Request entity with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the Request to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the Request entity with the specified ID
